name: [welcome to dreamsearch]
description:
[ dreamsearch]

Welcome User k̴̛̠̲̞̬̝̩͌̾͋̿̓́͐͗̑̐͂͝n̵̪̉͝y̸̧̙̣͓͈̻̥̳͓͖͚̏̈́̇̂͊̐̚͠͠t̵̨̢̧͇͍̭̮̪̖̳͉̹̬͆̌͐͌̑̆t̴̢̛̩̝̘̹̜̩͇̟̩̍͊̉͑͂̆̓́͌̑̚͝ẙ̵̛̗̈̋͊͛̊͒͐̑́ȕ̷̘̺͕̼̻̘̫͚̱̣̮̩́̈́͂̿̏̾͑̾͘̕͝͝ş̷̪̼̝̲̘̟͍̟̮͎̻̇̌̇̉̓̉́͂͊́̀̏͘͘͝d̶̢̛͈̻̪͍̰̳̖̫͍͑̽̀̇͂̒̀͆͊̾͝͠m̴͉̟͖̹͇̝̣̫̤̹̏̋̅̋́͐̐̈́̑̀͝͝s̷̨͖͎̲͇̜͇̫͖̜̺̠̫͑ or User ID #87JEQ2. 

You have downloaded your very own [dreamsearch] console. This device will allow you to record your dreams. But why would anyone do that? It is because you can sell these dreams and generate profit. And the best part? None of the emoluments will carry income tax.

The system has seen that you are about to embark on a dream labelled as [citrus sea].  More instructions will be available once you boot up the console.

Sweet dreams

- Niyama Co.

Controls

Pico-8 buttons may look unusual but they correspond to keys on your keyboard.

This correspondence will be shown in game but in case the text is unreadable or you need a reference, a table is below to guide you.

Pico-8 buttonKeyboardControls(X) buttonX on keyboardjumpcontinue dialogue(O) buttonZ on keyboardinteractplay the gameArrow keysArrow keysmove up/down/left/right A Game By Its Cover Jam

This was inspired by  the "My Dream Story" case seen below....
